Listen To This Sam Smith and Kanye West Mash-Up

posted by Andres Tardio on November 26, 2014 in Audio

Here’s a mash-up for Kanye West and Sam Smith fans. Carlos Serrano’s latest mash-up, “Tell Me I’m the Only One,” is a combination of Yeezy’s “Can’t Tell Me Nothin’” and Smith’s “I’m Not The Only One.” Listen to Smith’s heartfelt chorus between Kanye’s verses about purchasing a necklace instead of buying his way to heaven. And if that’s not enough Kanye for ya, check out this interview with his baby, North West.

Tags:  Kanye West, Sam Smith
